title: Dev SuperPowers: OnlineAPI Management
eventShortDescription:
​​API Management

With multi-platform world rapidly evolving, APIs are becoming key components in modern solutions. And while ASP.NET WebAPI gives you almost everything to build a great API there are a few areas to address e.g. who can access it? or do we charge for it?

Welcome to API Management. API management is the process of publishing, promoting and overseeing application programming interfaces (APIs) in a secure, scalable environment. It also includes the creation of end user support resources that define and document the API.

In this session I will show you how to address these concerns using Azure API Management.
